mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fb_user WHERE 1=1 AND fb_user_id IN ( SELECT fu.fb_user_id FROM fb_user fu LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM attend WHERE vote_id = ( SELECT vote_id FROM vote WHERE vote_date = #{sunday} ) ) A ON fu.fb_user_id = a.fb_user_id WHERE a.fb_user_id IS NULL OR fu.fb_user_id IS NULL ) AND fb_user_del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY fb_user_id DESC

SELECT fu.fb_user_id ,fu.fb_user_email ,fu.fb_user_pswd ,fu.fb_user_nickname ,fu.fb_user_name ,fu.fb_user_birth ,fu.fb_user_phone ,fu.fb_user_address ,fu.fb_user_auth ,fu.fb_user_del_yn ,fu.fb_user_reg_date ,fu.fb_user_mod_date ,a.attend_status FROM fb_user fu LEFT JOIN attend a ON fu.fb_user_id = a.fb_user_id WHERE 1=1 AND fu.fb_user_id IN( SELECT fb_user_id FROM attend WHERE vote_id = ( SELECT vote_id FROM vote WHERE vote_date = #{sunday} ) ) AND fu.fb_user_del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY fu.fb_user_id DESC;
